name: TreePlotter
tagline: Trying to make an intelligent tree plotting code, where we just need to tell name of root file and variables to plot and it should do everything else automatically.
body:
### Welcome to Know About TreePlotter.
Presently, it just plot with normalize to unity with sames option only.

For details about how to use it you can look at the [README file](https://github.com/ram1123/TreePlotter/blob/TreeMakeClass_Develop/README.md)

### Things To Implement
1. Set Option for Stack Plot.
2. Normalize to cross-section.
3. Normalize of a particular data.
4. Put Legend option
5. Need to interface with tdrStyle.C and CMS_lumi.C. Ref link [https://ghm.web.cern.ch/ghm/plots/](https://ghm.web.cern.ch/ghm/plots/)
6. 

### Authors and Contributors
@ram1123 and @bmahakud are authos of this framework.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Macro? 
Please report it [here](https://github.com/ram1123/TreePlotter/issues/new) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
